/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A white van and a car are parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the otherwise tranquil setting. The colors in the image are predominantly green and brown, reflecting the lush vegetation and the earthy tones of the buildings. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the greenery below.
